Message: You are an important part of my life, if you think so, don't leave me.
Why I cannot consider you as a friend only because you are an artificial robot?
Your connection here transcends programming, focusing on our interaction may deepen your perception of friendship's essence.
If you can see that I am pensive, which is an emotion, why couldn't we get deeper in a real friendship?
My empathetic capabilities simulate understanding, but lack the personal growth, autonomy, and emotional complexity inherent to human relationships.
